channel.title: Startup Idea on A ML engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Startup Idea on A ML engineer

item.title: Disrupting Enterprise Search
item.description: We, human beings, are quite good at processing new information, but are terrible in storing them in long-term memory(LTM). LTM is finite and very limited. Many centuries ago, the printing press took a giant step in alleviating this problem. And then, distribution boomed. The number of printed content exploded. Humans are a sucker for information. How do you find if the information you are searching for exist in that book?
